QueryToExecute:
with analysis as (
  select
    id,
    title,
    cardinality(array(select jsonb_object_keys(tags))) as num_tag_keys,
    subscription_id
  from
    azure_resource_group
)
select
  id as resource,
  case
    when num_tag_keys > $1::integer then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  title || ' has ' || num_tag_keys || ' tag(s).' as reason,
  subscription_id
from
  analysis;
